lines.text: Adam, where'd you find those two oafs?
Oh, they're not oafs, Jack. They would require practice to become oafs.

[singing]
He's not the real Prince Herbert. I am!
I need a favor, Mr. Durgom. I want these two clods assigned to the nitro detail, as soon as possible.
No, Mr. Durgom. Not permanently. Just until they die!
